summaries.novice: Learn basic strategies to approach the RBT exam with confidence and preparation.
summaries.standard: Apply time management, question analysis, and anxiety-reduction strategies during the exam.
summaries.expert: Demonstrate advanced test-taking strategy by breaking down complex scenarios and selecting answers using ABA reasoning.

novice.question: What should you do with every exam question?
novice.answer: Answer every question; never leave any blank.

novice.question: If you don’t know an answer right away, ______ the question.
Should you stay stuck on a difficult question?
novice.answer: No, move on and return later.

novice.question: Why is careful reading important?
novice.answer: Small wording differences can change the correct answer.

novice.question: Take the exam ______, not tired or hungry.
Should you cram heavily the night before the exam?
novice.answer: No, avoid heavy studying the day before.

novice.question: When should you arrive at the testing center?
What should you do if anxiety rises during the exam?
True or False: Guessing is penalized on the RBT exam.

standard.question: What should you do first if a question is confusing?
Why avoid heavy studying the day before?
What does flagging a question do?
What should you do after answering all questions?

expert.question: Two answers seem correct. Strategy?
expert.answer: Re-read, apply ABA definitions, eliminate distractors, choose BEST answer.

expert.question: Punishment vs reinforcement confusion.
expert.answer: Analyze effect on future behavior, not labels.

expert.question: Broad vs specific answers.
expert.answer: Choose the most precise answer unless question asks general.

expert.question: Multiple flagged questions remain.
expert.answer: Eliminate unlikely options and apply principles.

expert.question: Schedule mixed with DRA.
expert.answer: Identify the schedule first, then match DRA.

expert.question: Extinction mixed with punishment cues.
expert.answer: Confirm reinforcement removal vs stimulus change.

expert.question: Finished early.
expert.answer: Review flagged questions for careless errors.

expert.question: Long scenario question.
expert.answer: Break into ABC, identify function, match principle.

sections.title: Day-Before Preparation
sections.content: Avoid cramming. Do light review, relax, sleep well, and prepare materials ahead of time.

sections.title: Mindset & Environment
sections.content: Arrive early, eat appropriately, manage anxiety, and minimize distractions.

sections.title: Question-Taking Strategy
sections.content: Read carefully, eliminate distractors, answer easy questions first, and flag difficult items.

sections.title: Time Management & Review
sections.content: Monitor time, review flagged questions, and only change answers for clear reasons.
